Articles.Content: Just a interesting minor tweak we could make that mainly is something I would want for Machinima. While in the cockpit it would be great when you turned your Kerbals head to look at the next available Kerbal their eyes would lock and the other kerbal would give the viewing kerbal a kerbal head nod.
Sure why not, but if they decide to add more expressions, it'll probably be on the bottom of the list. There are much more important things to do.
